amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 594, the text of the amendment reported by the Committee on Ways and Means, modified by the Part A amendment reported by the Committee on Rules shall be considered as adopted and be made in order as original text.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
